mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, name, user_num, user_name, user_email, department_id, state) values (#{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_num = #{userNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=CHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, name, user_num, user_name, user_email, department_id, state from t_user
